name: IsleofWightFarmingMemories
0:
”Alexa, open Isle of Wight Farming Memories”
”Alexa, play Isle of Wight Farming Memories”
”Alexa, begin Isle of Wight Farming Memories”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: isle of wight farming memories
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to nearly 200 short snippets of great tales from 21 retired Isle of Wight farmers. The men and women talk about their memories of farming from years gone by, recounting what’s changed in this most vital of UK industries. Their wonderful Isle of Wight accents were captured in this Oral history project, supported by the Heritage Lottery Fund (HLF).

A fascinating insight, but if one doesn’t grab you, just say, “Alexa - next”, to skip to the next.

Put a face to the voices by visiting the FarmingMemories.com Website to see their portraits and historic photos of farming on the Isle of Wight.
